Package us.daveread.edu.graphics.test

Demonstrations of the GUI framework's capabilities.

The assets used by the test programs may be downloaded from http://www2.monead.com/assets.tar.gz. This file should be expanded at the root of the project where the test programs are being run.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DemoDrawingSurface
    A trivial demonstration (and test) of the DrawingSurface features.
    Fractal
    Abstract class to support plotting portions of fractals.
    FractalJulia
    Calculate and display portions of a Julia set.
    FractalMandelbrot
    Calculate and display portions of the Mandelbrot set.
    GameOfLife
    John Conway's Game of Life http://ddi.cs.uni-potsdam.de/HyFISCH/Produzieren/lis_projekt/proj_gamelife/ ConwayScientificAmerican.htm To use, create an instance and run it on a thread.
    MultiDrawingSurface1
    A simple DrawingSurface used for the MultiDrawingSurfaceTest.
    MultiDrawingSurface2
    A simple DrawingSurface used for the MultiDrawingSurfaceTest.
    MultiDrawingSurfaceTest
    Demonstrate an approach to managing multiple DrawingSurface instances and switching between them.
    PenTest
    Basic Pen operation demonstration.
    Pong
    Classic game of Pong.
    ScrabbleBoard  
    ScrabbleCell  
    SetupDocFiles
    Run this program to setup the doc-files html entries for the sample programs
    SirQlateBoard
    An early mock-up of the main playing board for SirQlate.
    SwingWidgets
    Simple demonstration of using JGF and Swing components on a DrawingSurface.
    TurtleTest
    Various test of the Turtle language support library.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FractalArea
    Define common portions of Fractal sets (Mandelbrot and Julia).
    FractalColorScheme
    Color schemes for rendering fractal plots.
    PaddleLocation
    The zones of a paddle.
